title: Covalex Local Shipment Route
description:
Hello,

There is a large shipment of packages that is ready to be brought over to the ~mission(Dropoff1) at ~mission(Dropoff1|Address). With the number of boxes you’ll be moving, it might make sense to bring a friend along to give you a hand.

PACKAGES FOR PICK UP (ANY ORDER) 
     · Package <EM4>#~mission(Item1|SerialNumber)</EM4> from the <EM4>~mission(Pickup1|Address)</EM4>
     · Package <EM4>#~mission(Item2|SerialNumber)</EM4> from the <EM4>~mission(Pickup2|Address)</EM4>
     · Package <EM4>#~mission(Item3|SerialNumber)</EM4> from the <EM4>~mission(Pickup3|Address)</EM4>
     · Package <EM4>#~mission(Item4|SerialNumber)</EM4> from the <EM4>~mission(Pickup4|Address)</EM4>
     · Package <EM4>#~mission(Item5|SerialNumber)</EM4> from the <EM4>~mission(Pickup5|Address)</EM4>
     · Package <EM4>#~mission(Item6|SerialNumber)</EM4> from the <EM4>~mission(Pickup5|Address)</EM4>
     · Package <EM4>#~mission(Item7|SerialNumber)</EM4> from the <EM4>~mission(Pickup6|Address)</EM4>
     · Package <EM4>#~mission(Item8|SerialNumber)</EM4> from the <EM4>~mission(Pickup6|Address)</EM4>
     · Package <EM4>#~mission(Item9|SerialNumber)</EM4> from the <EM4>~mission(Pickup7|Address)</EM4>
     · Package <EM4>#~mission(Item10|SerialNumber)</EM4> from the <EM4>~mission(Pickup7|Address)</EM4>
     · Package <EM4>#~mission(Item11|SerialNumber)</EM4> from the <EM4>~mission(Pickup8|Address)</EM4>
     · Package <EM4>#~mission(Item12|SerialNumber)</EM4> from the <EM4>~mission(Pickup8|Address)</EM4>
     · Package <EM4>#~mission(Item13|SerialNumber)</EM4> from the <EM4>~mission(Pickup9|Address)</EM4>
     · Package <EM4>#~mission(Item14|SerialNumber)</EM4> from the <EM4>~mission(Pickup9|Address)</EM4>
     · Package <EM4>#~mission(Item15|SerialNumber)</EM4> from the <EM4>~mission(Pickup9|Address)</EM4>

DROP OFF LOCATION
     · All Packages delivered to the <EM4>~mission(Pickup1)</EM4> at <EM4>~mission(Pickup1|Address)</EM4>

Hope everything goes smoothly,

Chase Hewitt
Jr. Logistics Coordinator
Covalex Shipping  
'Anything you need, anywhere you need it.'
